name: Ultra Break
description:
Ultra Break is a modern take on the classic brick-breaker genre which merges classic, fast-paced gameplay with new mechanics and tight controls.

Features
  • Special attacks, power-ups, and powerful weapon pickups.
  • Tight, responsive controls and a dash mechanic for fast-paced movement.
  • A rewarding combo system.
  • An upgrade system that lets you customize your gameplay style.
  • A branching over-world map that allows you to choose what order you tackle stages.
